actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for immediate care services under titles XIV and XIX of such act.

summary.text: Expands the term "hospital" under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include immediate care facilities. Provides coverage under title XIX (Medicaid) of such Act for the institutional costs of the specialized medical services of facilities treating cases requiring immediate care. Makes a facility eligible for reimbursement if it meets medical standards comparable to those required of a hospital emergency room.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for immediate care services under titles XIV and XIX of such act.
